channel.title: [VB6][Question] how do i make a crossahair to drag onto a program?
channel.description: well i would like to know how 2 make a cross hair to target a program... like the cross hair on scar

item.title: [VB6][Question] how do i make a crossahair to drag onto a program?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

Well, you can use a bitmap, and on mousedown, make the bitmap follow the mouse. This wont work if you drag if off the screen, however. So what I did a while back, is made the mousdown procedure of the image (crosshairs) turn the cursor into the crosshairs.

Then I would recommend going to google and search for “vb forums”. Pick the first one, it is a pretty good VB programming forum. Ask there, they will know.

Read full topic
